columns.datasetId: The unique identifier for each dataset entry.
columns.datasetName: The name assigned to the dataset.

dataset.table_description: The table stores information about various datasets.

columns.journalId: The unique identifier for each journal entry.
columns.journalName: The name assigned to the journal.

journal.table_description: The table stores information about various academic journals.

columns.citingPaperId: The unique identifier of the paper that cites another paper.
columns.citedPaperId: The unique identifier of the paper being cited.

cite.table_description: The table tracks citation relationships between academic papers.

columns.venueId: The unique identifier for each venue.
columns.venueName: The name assigned to the venue.

venue.table_description: The table stores information about various academic venues.

columns.authorId: The unique identifier for each author.
columns.authorName: The name assigned to the author.

author.table_description: The table stores information about authors of academic works.

columns.datasetId: The unique identifier for each dataset linked to papers.
columns.paperId: The unique identifier for each academic paper.

paperDataset.table_description: The table links academic papers to their respective datasets.

columns.paperId: The unique identifier for each academic paper.
columns.keyphraseId: The unique identifier for each keyphrase associated with papers.

paperKeyphrase.table_description: The table associates keyphrases with academic papers.

columns.paperId: The unique identifier for each academic paper.
columns.authorId: The unique identifier for each author of the paper.

writes.table_description: The table tracks the authorship of academic papers.

columns.keyphraseId: The unique identifier for each keyphrase.
columns.keyphraseName: The name assigned to the keyphrase.

keyphrase.table_description: The table stores information about various keyphrases used in academic papers.

columns.paperId: The unique identifier for each academic paper.
columns.title: The title assigned to the academic paper.
columns.venueId: The unique identifier for the venue where the paper was presented.
columns.year: The year the academic paper was published.
columns.numCiting: The number of papers that cite this paper.
columns.numCitedBy: The number of times this paper has been cited.
columns.journalId: The unique identifier for the journal where the paper was published.

paper.table_description: The table stores information about academic papers and their citations.
